title: Mom, GIUNO's Too Broken!

fields.name: - Flipped Trigger ( 🏓 + <:
fields.value:
cyan:1106716163184009277> ): In addition to the previous trigger, cards played with 3+ effects, **Echo**, or of <:partisan:1107460550268559380> trigger this card.
- Effect: The player of that card is punished and gains 7 **Card Shards** as you choose 1 color from the card to add to one of your own. Yes, it turns into a <:colorless:1106434944261177374> card still.

desc:
Post 2347
- Unflipped Trigger: Someone plays a card affected by **Plus**, **Minus**, **Enhanced**, **Phantom**, **Ethereal**, or with 4+ colors.
- Effect: That card has all of its effects removed and is treated as a <:colorless:1106434944261177374> card.
